short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Toggle between github.com and gist.io when viewing gists

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Write a GitHub gist, present it with style. Publish a quick, anonymous note or a long essayâ€”your content stays on GitHub, and gist.io makes it a pleasure to read.

This extension adds an icon in the omnibox on github gists and gist.io pages. Clicking the icon when viewing a github gist will take you to the corresponding gist.io page, and vice-versa.
